entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -27.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 10:48 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
